slide.title: LC_MONETARY
slide.subtitle: formatting amounts of money
slide.example:
'ar_EG.UTF-8', 'Finland  ' => 'fi_FI.UTF-8',
  'Germany ' => 'de_DE.UTF-8', 'Israel   ' => 'iw_IL.UTF-8', 
  'Japan   ' => 'ja_JP.UTF-8', 'Netherlands' => 'nl_NL.UTF-8',
  'Norway  ' => 'no_NO.UTF-8',
);

foreach ($locales as $country => $locale) {
  setlocale(LC_MONETARY, $locale);
  $nr = 31415.92654;
  echo "$country\t",
    money_format("[%i]", $nr), "    \t",
    money_format("[%n]", $nr), "\n";
}
?>
